song.title: How Great is Our God
song.lyrics:
[1] . G The splendor of the King .Em7 clothed in majesty . C2 Let all the earth rejoice . All the earth rejoice || . G He wraps Himself in light . Em7 And darkness tries to hide . C2 And trembles at his voice . Trembles at his voice
[C] . G D/F# How great is our God, sing with me . Em7 D/F# How great is our God, all will see . C D C G How great, how great is our God
--- [2] .G Age to age He stands . Em And time is in His hands . C Beginning and the end . Beginning and the end || . G The Godhead, three in one .Em Father, Spirit, Son . C The Lion and the Lamb . The Lion and the Lamb
[B] .G D/F# Name above all Names .Em7 D/F# Worthy of all praise .C My heart will sing .D G How great is our God
